featured.text: The scholar then developed an equation to find the most depressing day of the year, and it turned out to be the third Monday in January.
Many scholars and experts from all over the world will be invited to attend this yearly ______ on drug control.
Some scholars theorize that onions may have been used for the dead because it was believed that their strong scent would 40 the dead to breathe again.
The many awards that Professor Wang has won over the years are clear ______ that he is a distinguished scholar.

definition.zh_def: 學者，專門從事學術研究或教學的人。
definition.en_def: A scholar is a person who is highly educated or has an extensive knowledge in a particular field, often engaged in academic research or teaching.
definition.example: The scholar published a groundbreaking paper on ancient history.
